sentence.Network_en: As a hedonist, I survive only for pleasure.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一个享乐主义者，我活着的唯一目的就是快乐。

sentence.Network_en: I was a spiritual hedonist, and wished tothe gratification of making this novel and piquant acquaintance.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是一个精神享乐主义者, 希望与这位活泼的新朋友相识而带来的喜悦能经久不衰.

sentence.Network_en: All this was contrasted with the egocentric, hedonist , carefree existence of the man - about - town.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一切, 又是对比与自我中心, 无忧无虑的存在人为约集镇.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 我觉得，我们都是不同程度的享乐主义者（hedonist），有时候我在想，要是人活着不为了让自己快乐，那活着还有什么意义？其实不论如何，只要能让我们快乐起来的.

entry.def: A hedonist is someone who believes that having pleasure is the most important thing in life.

means.word_mean: 1. someone motivated by desires for sensual pleasures
